title: Toast rack
provenance: Museum purchase through gift of Margery and Edgar Masinter and from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund from Phillips de Pury & Luxembourg, New York, NY
description: In the form of an openwork frame, the rectangular base set with seven alternating triangular supports along length of base; tall T-shaped handle rises from center; short peg foot at each corner of base.
name: Toast rack
